ygData.subject: Re: Apologies and a Funny Story
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/16/99 8:34:27 AM Mountain Standard Time, Diablokilr@aol.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/16/99 8:34:27 AM Mountain Standard Time,
Diablokilr@... writes:

<< That is the best story I have ever heard and probably more truth than we
know
8)


And I would like to apologize for not getting in the flaming so I could
apologize 8)


Take care all and I for one Forgive anyone who apologizes even if they have
to do it a million times 8}~

Abat Tinker Solusek Ro
>>


Thats amazing end a post on with a laugh and everyones attitude changes.
Going to try that more often. Hehe. Good job!! Squashed that flamatory
chain of posts.

MORE POWER TO DA GNOMES!!!

Shmellbee NuckinFutz Povar. (A tinkering gnome that could give a damn.) :o)
